pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gaim (2013, TV show)$(br2)Used as the base item and repair material for most Gaim items

Found inside $(l:misc/city/centers#yggdrasil_tower)Yggdrasil Tower$(/l), a Gaim $(l:misc/stageshow)Stageshow$(/l), and in suspicious gravel around $(l:gaim/structures/rosyuo_helheim_city)Over $(/l)$(l:gaim/structures/redyue_helheim_city)Lords'$(/l) $(l:gaim/structures/demushu_helheim_city)structures$(/l)$(br2)Drops from:$(li)$(l:misc/blocks/helheim_vine)Helheim Vine$(/l)$(li)$(l:gaim/mobs/elementary_inves_red)Elementary Inves$(/l)$(li)$(l:gaim/mobs/kurokage_trooper)Kurokage Troopers$(/l)$(li)$(l:gaim/mobs/zangetsu_shin)Kamen Rider Zangetsu Shin$(/l)$(li)$(l:gaim/mobs/marika)Kamen Rider Marika$(/l)$(li)$(l:gaim/mobs/duke)Kamen Rider Duke$(/l)$(li)$(l:gaim/mobs/sigurd)Kamen Rider Sigurd$(/l)$(li)$(l:gaim/mobs/megahex)Megahex$(/l)
